node.title: UEFA bungles Champions League draw
node.alt: Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbapp√© lean in to hug each other while smiling after mbappe scored a goal for PSG
node.description: UEFA will have to redo the Champions League draw for the round of 16 after mistakenly placing Manchester United's name into the wrong pot.
node.content: ["On the heels of broadcast issues in The Ashes and controversy reigning at the finish of Formula 1's Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, UEFA have had their own embarrassing bungle\u00a0by mistakely placing Manchester United's name into the wrong pot of the Champions League draw.", "The European football body will now need to\u00a0redo the round of 16 draw after voiding the initial results due to the mistake.\u00a0", "The initial results had created a heavily anticipated match-up between Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi after Manchester United was paired with Paris Saint-Germain.", "However, United had initially been paired with Villarreal even though the English club's name should not have been in that pot since the two advanced from the same group.", "UEFA blamed the mishap on \"a technical problem with the software of an external service provider that instructs the officials as to which teams are eligible to play each other.\"", "\"As a result of this, the draw has been declared void,\" UEFA said in a statement published 90 minutes after the draw was done.", "A new draw is set to take place at 3pm\u00a0local time (1am AEDT).", "After United's name was initially pulled out, Manchester City was then drawn to play Villarreal instead.", "United's name was then not put in the pot as a potential opponent for Atl\u00e9tico Madrid in the subsequent pairing, which saw Bayern Munich picked out.", "PSG and Man United were later the final two teams picked.", "AP/ABC"]
